entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:03 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -25.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pickle Lake Airport 12:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -25.8°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -30.4°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
